item.title: 2395. Find Subarrays With Equal Sum
item.description: # Time Complexity: O(n) # Space Complexity: O(k), numbers of sum class Solution: def findSubarrays(self, nums: List[int]) -> bool: sums = set() for i in range(len(nums)-1): t = nums[i]+nums[i+1] if t in sums: return True else: sums.add(t) return False
